citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00-11:30am on
10-JAN-22. Facility representative stated that the licensee was away and that no other responsible adult was able to
accompany an inspection at that time.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00-11:30am on 
10-JAN-22. Facility representative stated that the licensee was away and that no other responsible adult was able to 
accompany an inspection at that time. 
 
 
 
End Section
